description:
Pablo and Łukasz run a new podcast where they discuss the implementation
details of CPython and what the development process looks like. In this
fireside chat session with invited core developer guests, they talk
about how Python 3.13 reaches the pivotal point for some of the most
anticipated features ever.

Come join us to hear about how working on Python works in practice. Ask
questions, be part of this exciting time in the history of our favorite
programming language!
title: A Fireside Chat With the Hosts of the Core.py Podcast
